name: Refining
shortDesc: Refines the settlements resource to increase its export value.

name: Trading Post
shortDesc: A small market trading in your factions goods.

name: Shipyard
shortDesc: Enables the production of a small amount of known ship hulls.

name: Ordnance Manufacturing
shortDesc: The necessary manufacturing halls for assembling weapons & fighters.

name: Stockpile
shortDesc: Improve the storage facilities of the settlement.

name: Maintenance Bays
shortDesc: Improves the condition of your fleet.

name: Specialised Training
shortDesc: Performs special training for your crew.

name: Logistics Base
shortDesc: Hosts a small logistic fleet to assist in operations.

name: Gate Beacon
shortDesc: Allows gates to direct towards this settlement.

name: Headquarters
shortDesc: A governing facility for a planets colony.
